amendment.description: To require the Federal Aviation Administration to establish minimum standards for space for passengers on passenger aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3483 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 43.

action.text: Amendment SA 3483 proposed by Senator Nelson for Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1786, S1789; text: CR S1786) To require the Federal Aviation Administration to establish minimum standards for space for passengers on passenger aircraft.
